Container.Name: Ghostfolio
Container.Overview:
This Community Application provides the official Ghostfolio container.
Ghostfolio is an open source wealth management software built with web technology. The application empowers busy people to keep track of stocks, ETFs or cryptocurrencies and make solid, data-driven investment decisions.
Project Page: https://ghostfol.io/ GitHub Repository: https://github.com/ghostfolio/ghostfolio
CAUTION! Ghostfolio requires a Postgres and Redis instance to run. Make sure to set them up first and reference the required variables down below. A detailed description of how to setup ghostfolio can be found in the Support Thread: https://forums.unraid.net/topic/123829-support-community-applications-ghostfolio/
